text: Douglas Galvão Silva or simply Douglas (born May 21, 1986 in Brasília), is a Brazilian striker. He currently plays for Clube Atlético Linense. Made professional debut for Goiás in a 1-3 defeat away to Flamengo in the Campeonato Brasileiro on August 26, 2007. ==Contract== *13 December 2005 to 31 January 2008 == References == == External links == * CBF * goiasesporteclube * Guardian Stats Centre Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Ituano FC players Category:Association football forwards
title: Douglas Galvão Silva
